item.description:
Have you ever been to a Murder Mystery Party, well this one our second party, everyone loved it the first time, it's is lot's of fun! We will be having the event in an old historic theater located in downtown Rochester, NH, it is under renovations but will be ready for our party.

The theater is called the "Scenic Theater", and it can hold about 900 people, so its fairly large. This game is not a board game; everyone will be participating at the same time; you must not be afraid of the dark, and you must dress all in black clothing! This is not a show. The downstairs floor is somewhat inclined so wear sneakers or comfortable walking shoes.

We will be having a potluck before the game so bring something special. We will meet at 6 pm to socialize at which time I will explain the game and give a brief tour of the building then at 7pm the mystery will start. This is not a child event so please do not bring your children.

I anticipate we will have a fairly large amount of people coming so I will be limiting the number of people for this event to 50. I may be combining this with some other meetup groups. After the party we can go dancing at Slim's Tex Mex restaurant.

More details will follow as we get closer to the event.

This is a free event.

If you have any questions call me at 603-509-2907.

See you there for a wonderful special night!

Peter
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy in the black cape.
item.name: Trailblazers Event: Murder Mystery Party
